document.full_text: u-prince  - experts charged by the united nations with probing the cause of a deadly cholera epidemic in haiti pointed on wednesday to fecal contamination by a riverside u.n. peacekeepers' camp as a likely cause, but a u.n. spokesman said that could not be seen as conclusive.
document.title: u.n. haiti cholera panel avoids blaming peacekeepers
lines_and_colors: u-prince  - experts charged by the united nations with probing the cause of a deadly cholera epidemic in haiti pointed on wednesday to fecal contamination by a riverside u.n. peacekeepers' camp as a likely cause, but a u.n. spokesman said that could not be seen as conclusive.
